grails.plugin.multitenant.core.util.log.log
[Java] Class MultiTenantLogLayout

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.log4j.Layout
      org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
          MultiTenantLogLayout

public class MultiTenantLogLayout
extends org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout

This class will set up a pattern to support inserting the tenant id or name into the beginning of any logging pattern. It will either enhance an existing pattern or create a new pattern with the tenant id or tenant name at the beginning of the patter.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String DEFAULT_TENANT_CONVERSION_PATTERN

Inserts a %T after the $t (thread logging) to display the current tenant mapped id.

Constructor Detail

MultiTenantLogLayout

public MultiTenantLogLayout()
This is a constructor that does not take a pattern and there fore uses the defined default pattern.

MultiTenantLogLayout

public MultiTenantLogLayout(java.lang.String inPattern)
This constructor allows for creation using a user defined pattern
Parameters:
inPattern - - The user defined logging pattern that can contain a %T where the tenant id will be inserted.

 
Method Detail

createPatternParser

public org.apache.log4j.helpers.PatternParser createPatternParser(java.lang.String inPattern)
This will create a pattern parser using the defined user pattern or the default pattern if one is not supplied. This parser knows how to insert the current tenant id in to the proper location in the pattern.
Parameters:
inPattern - - The logging pattern to use during the parsing operation.
Returns:
